title: Soondubu Jjigae (Korean beef and tofu stew)
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon crushed garlic', '1/2 teaspoon vegetable oil', '1/2 teaspoon Korean red pepper powder (gochugaru)', '120g beef mince', '600g soft tofu', '320ml water', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 egg', '3 spring onions, sliced']
